thread.section_title: Munchery Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Munchery | www.munchery.com
thread.title: Stephanie Cozart Burton
thread.title_full: Munchery reviewed by Stephanie Cozart Burton

author: Stephanie Cozart Burton
title: Stephanie Cozart Burton
text: I really enjoy the variety and convenience of the meals. The majority are very good and I am a foodie! The portions usually allow for leftovers and the cooking kits are easy to prepare and give a nice sense of cooking without all the fuss. Highly recommend.
